description: This file defines a React custom hook 'useNotes' for managing notes within a frontend application. It handles fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and selecting notes, using React hooks such as useState, useEffect, useMemo, and useCallback. The hook interacts with external services for data operations and manages local state for note management.

methods.name: useNotes({ userId = null } = {})
methods.description: Custom React hook for managing note data including fetching, creating, editing, deleting, and maintaining selected notes.
